## R Markdown

```{r}
data <- read.BayesANT.data(fasta.file = "../FinBOL_SplitSeq_test.gzip")
model <- BayesANT(data = data, type_location = 'pairs')

document()

out <- predict(model, DNA = data$DNA[1:100])

out

model <- BayesANT(data = data, typeseq = "not aligned")

```
